scripts.release:check: pnpm build && pnpm typecheck && pnpm docs:build
scripts.release:publish:preflight: pnpm --filter @ambientcss/css build && pnpm --filter @ambientcss/components build && pnpm --filter @ambientcss/css typecheck && pnpm --filter @ambientcss/components typecheck
scripts.release:pack: rm -rf .artifacts && mkdir -p .artifacts && (cd packages/ambient-css && pnpm pack --pack-destination ../../.artifacts) && (cd packages/ambient-components && pnpm pack --pack-destination ../../.artifacts)
scripts.release:publish: pnpm --filter @ambientcss/css publish --access public --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter @ambientcss/components publish --access public --no-git-checks
scripts.release:publish:next: pnpm --filter @ambientcss/css publish --access public --tag next --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter @ambientcss/components publish --access public --tag next --no-git-checks
